title: Citroën rebuked by UK minister over handling of mass safety recall
description: Transport secretary urges Stellantis to offer more help after tens of thousands are left unable to use their car
content:
The transport secretary, Heidi Alexander, has expressed “serious concerns” about Citroën’s handling of a safety recall that has left thousands of Britons unable to drive their cars.

title: Alcohol consumption and your health: What the science says
description: Is a nightly glass of wine — or two, even — good for you? Bad for you? Or somewhere in between? Stanford experts discuss the health implications of moderate alcohol consumption and how the guidelines have changed.
content: “A lot of people who don’t currently drink are people who used to drink heavily, or who have health problems that led them to quit,” said Keith Humphreys, PhD, a professor of psychiatry and behavioral sciences and the Esther Ting Memorial Professor. ... [8707 chars]

title: Makati grants tax relief to victims of July floods
description: RESIDENTS and businesses hit by last month’s floods will get tax relief under a new ordinance signed by Mayor Nancy Binay.
content:
RESIDENTS and businesses hit by last month’s floods will get tax relief under a new ordinance signed by Mayor Nancy Binay.

title: American College of Cardiology establishes a digital hypertrophic cardiomyopathy registry
description: The American College of Cardiology has established a digital hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM) registry to learn more about one of the most common genetic cardiovascular diseases and provide more equitable access to treatment and care.
